channel.title: Avarr 718| Most Advanced Runescape Private Server|
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/logo2-1.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://www.avarr.weebly.com"]PLAY NOW[/URL][/CENTER]
[quote][center][size=36pt][size=24pt][size=18pt]Avarr is a 718 loading 752 Runescape Private Server. We are one of the Top 718 Runescape Private Server with packed features such as Duo Slayer , Dungeoneering ,Complete clan chat system , 100% Grand Exchange , Multiple Quests ,Active wilderness ,Flawless combat ,24 working skills[/size]![/size][/size][
[center][size=24pt]Features[/size][/center] - All 24 Skills are Trainable - I edited the Stats tab, You can click each skill icon and the player will be teleported to an area to train the skill you chose. - Farming works Raking/Planting/Harvesting all Vegetables/Herbs/Flowers in Catherby/Falador. - Tree Farming Falador - Construction works with dialogues, for example you can make more than one Regular Altar but also the choice between a gilded one. - Other training places. Decided to get rid of only Rock crabs and make some more. - Worked out Location System - Random Event system - Trivia - Custom made Balmug weapon. Kill all bosses around 10-15 times to unlock this weapon. - Double Prayer EXP by using bones on altar in your own house. - Sunfreet and Pest Queen - 2 Quests - Dwarf Cannon 100% - RuneSpan - Undead Nightmare - Bank Tabs - Using Destabiliser to Change the color of the Whip - ALL NPC's have a chance to drop Charmes - Ganodermic Beasts Drop all Flakes and Spores to use Crafting and make all sets with the right items. - ALL clue scrolls are working as they should. - Activating Lodestones by talking to the NPC near the Stone. - Fixed equipment tab to not showing up
[img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_1-3.png[/img] [img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_4-2.png[/img] [img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_5-3.png[/img] [img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_2-3.png[/img] [img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_3-3.png[/img] [img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/2vkg6t4.jpg[/img][/center] [img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/2198110_orig.jpg[/img][center][/center]
[size=36pt][url=http://www.avarr.weebly.com]www.avarr.weebly.com[/url][/size]

item.title: Avarr 718| Most Advanced Runescape Private Server|
item.dc:creator: @Avarr718 Avarr718
item.description:
@Avarr718 wrote:

[center]

[URL=http://“http://www.avarr.weebly.com”]PLAY NOW[/URL][/CENTER]

[quote][center][size=36pt][size=24pt][size=18pt]Avarr is a 718 loading 752 Runescape Private Server. We are one of the Top 718 Runescape Private Server with packed features such as Duo Slayer , Dungeoneering ,Complete clan chat system , 100% Grand Exchange , Multiple Quests ,Active wilderness ,Flawless combat ,24 working skills[/size]![/size][/size][

[center][size=24pt]Features[/size][/center]

  • All 24 Skills are Trainable
  • I edited the Stats tab, You can click each skill icon and the player will be teleported to an area to train the skill you chose.
  • Farming works Raking/Planting/Harvesting all Vegetables/Herbs/Flowers in Catherby/Falador.
  • Tree Farming Falador
  • Construction works with dialogues, for example you can make more than one Regular Altar but also the choice between a gilded one.
  • Other training places. Decided to get rid of only Rock crabs and make some more.
  • Worked out Location System
  • Random Event system
  • Trivia
  • Custom made Balmug weapon. Kill all bosses around 10-15 times to unlock this weapon.
  • Double Prayer EXP by using bones on altar in your own house.
  • Sunfreet and Pest Queen
  • 2 Quests
  • Dwarf Cannon 100%
  • RuneSpan
  • Undead Nightmare
  • Bank Tabs
  • Using Destabiliser to Change the color of the Whip
  • ALL NPC’s have a chance to drop Charmes
  • Ganodermic Beasts Drop all Flakes and Spores to use Crafting and make all sets with the right items.
  • ALL clue scrolls are working as they should.
  • Activating Lodestones by talking to the NPC near the Stone.
  • Fixed equipment tab to not showing up






[/center]
[center][/center]

[size=36pt]www.avarr.weebly.com[/size]
